subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: While Kevin Harvick outgunned Kyle Busch for the checkered flag in the Chevy Rock & Roll 400 Saturday night, the real drama played out behind the leaders as Kasey Kahne raced his way into the Chase.
snippet: While Kevin Harvick outgunned Kyle Busch for the checkered flag in the Chevy Rock & Roll 400 Saturday night, the real drama played out behind the leaders as Kasey Kahne raced his way into the Chase.
